Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.aem.api.resources

Class AbstractLinkableResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.aem.api.resources.AbstractLinkableResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SlingLinkableResource, io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource
    public abstract class AbstractLinkableResource
extends Object
implements io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources.LinkableResource, SlingLinkableResource
    An abstract implementation of LinkableResource, that you can use as a super class for your sling models implementing your HalApiInterfaces. It provides injected fields with the commonly used SlingRhyme and SlingResourceAdapter sling models, and also contains an implementation of LinkableResource.createLink() that uses the SlingLinkBuilder to generate the link.
